divs: Sighting DetailsTrianglular ufo's here in southern California. First, Kerman California, large triangular craft , amber lights flying relatively low, slow, silent hovering. 2nd, another low, slow flying craft but much smaller and with blue hued lights in Visalia Ca, 3rd was also triangular and with blue lights. It silently passed over my daughter and I as we watched it hover approximately 300 ft above as if surveying the landscape. incident lasted for 5 minutes. Also, Police officer reported UFO here in Kerman in 1978. Look into this. Seems strange to have so much activiy for such a small town.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kerman
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO activity, 1 in Visalia Ca, 3 in Kerman Ca, 1 already documented 1978
